description: Dive into "Kuching's Mall Adventure: Shop and Explore" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Kuching's Mall Adventure: Shop and Explore

places.generalDescription: AEON Mall Kuching Central is a modern and spacious shopping destination in Kuching, Malaysia. Boasting over 100 stores spread across multiple levels, the mall offers an extensive range of shopping options including clothing stores, shoe shops, and a supermarket for daily needs. With its one million square feet of retail space and more than 135 outlets, it's a popular choice for both locals and tourists.

sources.snippet: To know: If you are searching for the best shopping in Kuching Malaysia, we are here to guide you!. Indeed, Aeon Mall Kuching Central is considered the top shopping mall in Kuching that you will surely like for the endless choices it gives!. To do: You will find its many areas that are filled with a variety of wonderful clothing stores and shoe stores, and additionally, there‚Äôs also a supermarket that allows you the possibility to buy all of your daily needs.

There are 1,800 car park bays spread over five floors of parking, with parking reaching the roof top.

places.name: AEON Mall Kuching Central

reviews.text: AEON Kuching is probably the second-best mall in the city after Vivacity. It's spacious and comfortable to walk around. The main attraction is the AEON store itself, as this is the only AEON in Kuching. There are also other branded shops, making it a good place for shopping and relaxing.

Pretty crowded in weekends and fair during weekdays.
Quite spacious. One good thing about this mall is the considerate thought for its customers. Seats are offered to those who cannot walk continuosly at intervals. Restrooms are strategically placed that does not require walking a great distance.
Food outlets are aplenty and for different age groups and wallets.
Look for the log seats if you need to charge your phone. So cool and considerate.
This Aeon Mall is a people-friendly mall.

Visited this AEON numerous times since 2022, most recent visit was on 07.07.24. Love this place. Way better than the AEON in KL/PJ. Plenty of parking (I always park at the rooftop), plenty of eateries.

places.address: Mall Management Office, First Floor, Jln Tun Datuk Patinggi Haji Ahmad Zaidi Adruce, Min Chu Garden, 93200 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: Vivacity Megamall is a massive retail complex in Kuching, Malaysia, designed by a top architecture firm. With over a million square feet and nearly 300 stores, it's the largest shopping destination in the city. The mall offers a wide range of options from high-end international brands to local boutiques, along with dining and entertainment choices like an impressive cinema and food courts.

sources.snippet: Designed by one of Malaysia‚Äôs top Architecture firms, Archicentre, and the very same team that designed Setia City Mall in Shah Alam, Kuala Lumpur, VIVACITY Megamall is planned to raise the level of retail experience in Kuching by leaps and bounds. The Jazz Suites @ VIVACITY ‚Äì 672 units of condominiums and suites provides a daily and ready catchment of at least 2,000 consumers for retailers in the mall. Designed by one of Sarawak‚Äôs top architecture firms, Akimedia, this uber cool set of apartment suites is primed to be the trendsetter in condominium living in this integrated development design.
sources.shortName: Top 3 Shopping Malls in Kuching

sources.snippet: Vivacity Megamall in Sarawak epitomizes the urban lifestyle with its vast array of shops, dining options, and entertainment facilities. As one of the largest malls in East Malaysia, Vivacity is home to a mix of well-known international brands and local boutiques, offering shoppers a variety of choices. The mall also boasts an impressive cinema, a large supermarket, and a diverse food court.

And as it should be, this mall offers you the shopping experience you have always dreamed of. Wealthy with international and domestic shops of various kinds, this mall caters to everyone‚Äôs shopping preferences to the max.

sources.snippet: It has a huge array of international clothing brands, as well as restaurants. VivaCity is the first mall in Kuching to have two food courts, one serving popular non-halal dishes, and another serving halal dishes. The mall has a children playground, a convention area and an eight screen cinema with IMAX and 3D screens.

Senarai Shopping Mall Di Kuching (Sarawak) Yang Popular

places.name: Vivacity Megamall

reviews.text: Vivacity Megamall is the biggest and best mall in Kuching. It has everything, apartments, a cinema, lots of food options, and many shops. Clean, modern, and great for both shopping and relaxing.

Vivacity Megamall is a great spot for shopping in Kuching, offering a wide variety of stores and dining options to cater to different tastes and preferences.

However, parking can be a bit troublesome, especially during peak hours, which might require some patience. Despite this, it remains one of the top shopping destinations in the city. Highly recommended for shoppers and visitors!

This modern mall delivers a solid shopping and dining experience in Kuching's growing satellite city area. While not as massive as The Spring, VivaCity covers all the basics with a good mix of international brands, local boutiques, and entertainment options.

The food court is a major draw - try the Sarawak laksa at the heritage food section or grab bubble tea from popular chains. The cinema offers comfortable seating with reasonable ticket prices, making it a favorite local hangout spot. Family-friendly features like the indoor playground and arcade keep kids entertained for hours.

Parking is plentiful (and free!), a rare perk in urban Kuching. The layout feels spacious and never too crowded, even on weekends. Look out for seasonal decorations and events that really liven up the central atrium.

Some stores feel a bit repetitive, and the luxury brand selection can't compete with downtown malls. But for everyday shopping needs or a casual day out, VivaCity hits the mark. The attached hotel adds convenience for visitors.

Rating: 4/5 - A dependable suburban mall that's worth the short drive from the city center. Not groundbreaking, but reliably good for what it offers.

Pro tip: Visit during weekday afternoons for the most relaxed experience. Don't miss the night market (pasar malam) in the parking lot area on select evenings for awesome local street food!

places.address: Ground Floor, Management Office, Q112B, 93350 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: Plaza Merdeka is a spacious indoor mall featuring a mix of domestic and international retailers, fast-food options, and a kids' play area. It's an ideal choice for budget-conscious travelers seeking a comfortable stay near Kuching's attractions. The mall offers high-quality mattresses, clean restrooms with ample amenities, and scenic views of the Saint Thomas Cathedral.

places.name: Plaza Merdeka

reviews.text: The mall is fully occupied, unlike some other malls. It has a premium feel with branded outlets. Conveniently located near the Kuching Waterfront, making it easy to visit while sightseeing.

A mid-ranged shopping mall that draws crowds in the afternoon and evening. Parking can be challenging unless tou come in the morning. A rather clean mall with outlets that may attract the younger crowd. Not so elderly friendly as there are limited benches to rest for them.

Plaza Merdeka in Kuching is a modern shopping mall that opened on December 12, 2012. It features six floors of retail space, housing international brands like Cotton-On and Starbucks. The mall offers a variety of dining options, including a food court with views of Padang Merdeka. Its central location provides easy access to nearby attractions such as the Kuching Waterfront and Chinatown. Visitors appreciate its cleanliness, ample parking, and comfortable lounging areas.

At the top floor, there are fun places for kids and teens like a Muay Thai gym, a skating area, and a big indoor playground. Good for families who want to relax or play, but not many big shops or food choices.

One of the best mall in Kuching because connected with Imperial Hotel and Imperial Apartment. Boulevard Shopping Mall has many outlets such as department store, fashion outlet, fitness centre, playground, accessories store, and etc.

My recommended outlet are Eco Shop because all items sold at RM 2.80 at the Ground Floor , Boulevard Foodcourt, e-Mart Supermarket in Basement, Super Save at first floor, and Abby Playground at Top Floor (4th Floor).

places.name: Farley Kuching

reviews.text: A small and simple mall. The supermarket is the main highlight. Offers cheap prices and good promotions. Clean and good for quick grocery shopping.

We recently checked out Farley Supermarket, located in the heart of Farley Shopping Mall in Kuching.

This supermarket is a shopper's dream! It's packed with a huge variety of products, neatly arranged on shelves.From fresh, juicy meats to frozen treats and canned goods, you'll find everything you need.

Plus, the staff are friendly and always ready to lend a hand.

Just a heads up: Parking does come with a fee.

This Farley is one of type of small mall in Kuching, Sarawak which provides a supermarket, bakery, several clothes shops and a food court. Located at opposite Kuching Sentral, Farley looks very busy and can be seen by its large green letters.

The food court provides various types of food. The supermarket is also very spacious and provides a complete variety of goods. Some items are cheaper than other places but there are also items that are more expensive. There is a member card for visitors who want to make where points can be collected to exchange for necessary items.

It is recommended to visit because it is quite complete and the price is quite affordable.

reviews.text: It sounds like Christmas at The Spring in Kuching is truly a magical experience! The festive decorations, especially the beautifully adorned Christmas tree, must add such a vibrant atmosphere to the mall. With the recent renovations and the addition of more branded merchants, it seems like The Spring has become an even more enticing destination for shoppers and holidaymakers. The combination of holiday cheer and an upgraded shopping experience must make it a perfect place to visit during the Christmas season.
The Spring Mall is a nice and clean mall, a bit smaller than others but still has great shops, a cinema, and some premium outlets. Good place for shopping and relaxing.

The Spring Shopping Mall in Kuching, established in 2008, offers over 150 retail outlets across four floors, featuring brands like H&M, Uniqlo, and Parkson. Its FoodBazaar is praised for diverse cuisine and cleanliness. Recent renovations have enhanced its modern appeal, making it a premier shopping destination.

While it lacks entertainment areas, it's a great place to hang out while waiting for your connecting flight or next bus to other parts of Sarawak.

sources.snippet: To know: You can‚Äôt go wrong with choosing any place among our offered collections but Emart Batu Kawa Mall is deemed as one of the best shopping malls in Kuching Malaysia!. Bring your close people and come to have a remarkable memory watching several options while shopping!. To do: You are going to experience a great amount of satisfaction while watching its various spots that are filled with a collection of nice clothing stores and shoe stores, and additionally, there‚Äôs also a supermarket that grants you the possibility to get all of your daily needs.
sources.shortName: The 10 Best Shopping Malls in Kuching

places.name: Emart Batu Kawa

reviews.text:
E-Mart Batu Kawa operates 24 hours, which is a major flex especially for night owls like me who usually get back from exploring Kuching super late. The parking space is spacious, and when you enter, they scan your car's ID-so when you leave, the gate just opens up automatically. Love the techy smooth flow~

Inside, it's clean with a chill atmosphere. They've got tons of promos if you're a member (wish I had one, cryin' in non-member üò≠). But here's the catch: you will need to queue at the cashier... and I'm not kidding, even at 00.00 there can still be a line -like, this place really be the hangout spot for midnight grocery runs.

Prices are actually on the cheaper side, and they sell everything-groceries, produce, frozen goods, snacks, you name it. Basically your all-in-one mart that never sleeps üõí

The counter for oku, elderly and pregnant people should be bigger and hung up high so customer could notice it. And your packed item, u guys should weigh it first and pre-priced it then it will be more convenient, its a common logic for us consumer to know that the packed item already have a price on it and not to be re-weight. Its not convenient for me to re-run from counter 2-3 times just because of this

Seriously, Emart Batu Kawa-please update your notices properly. The washroom at the wet market is obviously closed, but your sign still points people to the side door. For what? A walk of disappointment?

I saw several people, including the elderly, trying to follow that misleading sign, only to find out the washroom is not even accessible. Do you know how frustrating that is, especially for those with limited mobility? It's not just ‚Äúa little mistake‚Äù-it's wasting people's time and energy.

It's not hard to update a sign. Please don't fool your customers like this. We deserve clear and accurate info, not a wild goose chase to a locked toilet.

places.address: Lot 6369, Block 225 KNLD, 4th Mile, Jalan Batu Kawa, Taman Desa Wira, 93250 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

sources.snippet: It is Majma Mall, and you will be surprised by the services that will make you feel excited while shopping with your close ones. To do: You‚Äôre going to come across many clothing stores and shoe stores in case you want to buy something new to wear. There is a supermarket where you can get what you need.
sources.shortName: The 10 Best Shopping Malls in Kuching

places.name: Majma' Mall

reviews.text: The Mall is clean, well manage, food stalls, restaurant also available. Parking facilities is good too.

Got so many government office here and if u are muslim, u are definitely going to love this place for its clothing needs. My mum love it and i really think if i have muslim girlfriend she will love it here as well. Wish me luck to have a wife/girlfriend before i reach 30 guys. Thank you. Oh and it is clean too.

Muslim friendly apparels aside, the food court here these days is absolutely lacking. What's happened? Some even only start cooking after 12 noon, on weekends. Only other option is the mall-owned restaurants and KFC. It takes many pull factors to come here. Maybe only just a seasonal mall after all. Really need to improve on appeal.

places.address: 41, Jalan P. Ramlee, 93400 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: Aeroville Mall is a relatively new shopping destination located at the end of Kuching International Airport Runway. It has quickly become popular among visitors for its markets and eateries, attracting people from all around. While some areas are still unoccupied, the mall offers a great shopping experience with various shops available. The weekend market is particularly attractive, filling up the carpark and offering a wide range of goods.

sources.snippet: Although Aeroville Mall is still relatively new, people are already coming to the mall from left to right to do their shopping. Many people love visiting this mall for its markets and eateries, so those two categories of outlets are always packed. This mall surely gives you a wonderful shopping experience since various shops are available.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Shopping Malls in Kuching 2024

places.name: Aeroville Mall

reviews.text:
KUCHING: Aeroville Shopping Mall, an up-and-coming premier commercial destination in the city, officially opened yesterday, with a sales exhibition and a half-marathon marking the launch.

This integrated commercial development sits on a 18.6-acre land, housing 62 units of
three-storey shophouses, 60 units of retail lots, two lots of food and beverage outlets, as well as a double-storey shopping block

Aeroville Shopping Mall is also equipped with flight information system, concierge service for flight passengers to check-in via online, resting zones for air travellers, Grab concierge service that connects with Kuching International Airport (KIA) and a well-secured luggage storage area.

Econsave Cash & Carry (Econsave) and restaurant operator Hoi Tin Lau Restaurant Sdn Bhd are the main tenants of the mall.

‚ÄúOne of the many uniqueness of Aerovillle Shopping Mall is it provides additional services to customers such as performing online check-in at the mall, luggage storage and flight information,‚Äù said Aeroville Shopping Mall director Tan Kun Gee.

Minister of Local Government and Housing Datuk Dr Sim Kui Hian, who officiated at the
opening ceremony yesterday, viewed this development as the latest landmark and tourist attraction in the city.

He said with the ongoing Visit Sarawak Year 2019 campaign, he assured everyone that the Sarawak government would continue boost the local tourism industry through a line-up of programmes and activities.

Dr Sim pointed out that the strategic location of the shopping mall, which is very near to the KIA, would provide a venue for passengers to fill up their flight-waiting time with activities.

The only good thing about this mall is there is a wet market outside the mall.
You can purchase fresh vegetables and fruits there.
Other than the wet market, inside the mall there is econsave, grocery convenient.  And mr diy and also supersave for your household convenient. There is also an area selling home furniture. Some restaurants around but not many.

Another good thing about this mall, parking lot everywhere. Haha

This is a relatively New 2 Storey Neighbourhood Mall located at Jalan Stutong Baru Kuching City Sarawak.It was Opened in May 2019 & due to MCO occupancy @ this Mall is still Low.Econsave  & Local Restaurant Hoi Tin Lau are  the two Anchor Tenants.As it's just 4 Km away from Kuching International Airport it is very convenient for Transit Passengers.In the Evening from 4 pm to 10 pm in Front of the Mall the Local Fresh Vegatable Market will start - relocated from Stutong Open air Market in 2020 due to Pendemic.There are about 70+ Sellers supplying all variety of Fresh Veg direct from Farm & also Fish/Chicken/Pork etc.Sellers are Friendly & Prices are Competitive.Also there is 1 Row of Free Covered Car Park in Front of Mall if U are Early .ü§©ü§©

places.address: Land District, Lot 19923 (Phase 2) Block 11, Jln Stutong Baru, Muara Tebas, 93350 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the residential area of BDC, Green Heights Shopping Mall is a cozy two-story mall that caters to the community's daily needs. The anchor tenant, Everrise, offers a diverse range of international products, making it a popular spot for grocery shopping. While lacking entertainment options, the mall provides a peaceful and uncrowded environment for visitors to shop comfortably. Additionally, it is praised as an ideal destination for purchasing gifts and artisan-crafted items.

sources.snippet: Jika anda melawat ke pusat bandar Kuching, antara Shopping Mall yang berdekatan (in walking distance) ialah Plaza Merdeka Shopping Mall, Riverside Shopping Mall, Hills Shopping Mall, Sarawak Plaza Shopping Mall, Electra House, Wisma Satok dan Wisma Hopoh. Jika anda berminat untuk shopping barangan elektronik (Smartpone/tablet/komputer/laptop), anda boleh pergi ke Wisma Saberkas yang memang terkenal dengan pusat untuk membeli barangan elektronik.
sources.shortName: Senarai Shopping Mall Di Kuching (Sarawak) Yang Popular

sources.snippet: This mall centres around being eco-friendly as it features tenants using eco-friendly shopping bags, ample bicycle parking spots, conserved lighting in the mall, optimal use of natural lighting and recycling bins everywhere in the mall. On the weekend, you can find a flea market on the ground where local goods are available for purchase. Also, this mall has various shops to make your shopping day great.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Shopping Malls in Kuching 2024

sources.snippet: Green Heights Mall Green Heights Mall is a 2 storey suburban mall located in the vicinity of Green Heights. Opened in 2008, it was developed by reputable property developer PSB Properties, a subsidiary of Permodalan Sarawak berhad. PSB Properties developed the fast appreciating high end residential surrounding area of Green Heights which includes bungalows, semi [‚Ä¶]
sources.shortName: Shopping Malls in Kuching Archives

sources.snippet: The Green Height Mall is located within the housing area of BDC and it is considered as one of the most popular malls of the city. This mall is a small two-storeyed mall which is mostly famous for the grocery stores that it has. Apart from it, there are a number of food joints where the tourists come and gorge on amazing delicacies.
sources.shortName: Best Shopping Malls in Kuching

sources.snippet: Located in the housing area of BDC, Green Heights Mall is a small two storey mall. Most people come here to buy groceries and eat as there is no entertainment space at the mall. The anchor tenant for the mall is ColdStorage, which sells a variety of international products.Address: Lorong Lapangan Terbang 2, Green Heights, Kuching.
sources.shortName: Shopping Malls in Kuching

places.name: Green Heights Shopping Mall

reviews.text: It is a decent shopping mall. It is clean and also well-maintained too. I am just wandering around and buying my breakfast in their supermarket. It is worth my time. I will definitely come again.

The choices of pies and delicious cakes are worth a visit to this outlet. Small and cozy. Pricey but quality of food is good and delicious! Worth every penny and do take time to savor & tasted every bite!

Best supermarket in Kuching! The only place I could get decent sized cuts (200g and above) of fresh salmon. Other supermarkets like Emart salmon portions are so small (only 100g or less) I mistook them for sashimi. The supermarket also has regular promotions for wine. The pork cold cuts range is limited but better than the vacuum packed ham. There is also smoked salmon!
I wish the supermarket has a better bakery section with bagels, croissants, Brioche or at least imported English muffins.

places.address: Lorong Lapangan Terbang 2, Green Heights, 93250 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: City One Megamall Kuching in Sarawak is a bustling retail and entertainment complex, featuring over 400 stores and restaurants as well as a movie theater. It offers an extensive range of shopping options, from fashion and beauty to electronics and sports gear. The mall also provides various entertainment facilities such as a multiplex cinema and a bowling alley, making it a popular choice for a fun day out.

sources.snippet: City One Megamall Kuching in Sarawak is a thriving retail and entertainment center. This mall caters to a wide range of shopping needs with its extensive selection of stores, from fashion and beauty to gadgets and sports equipment. City One is not just about shopping; it also offers various entertainment options, including a multiplex cinema and a bowling alley, making it a popular destination for a fun-filled day out.
sources.shortName: 7 Most Popular Shopping Mall in Kuching, Sarawak | GoTriip

sources.snippet: AEON MALL Kuching Central is the latest shopping mall in Kuching City, serving crowds nearby third mile and Batu Kawa. AEON MALL Kuching Central has over 1.6 million square feet of gross built-up area, housing more than 130 retail lots spread across three floors.
sources.shortName: Shopping Malls in Kuching | Visit Sarawak

sources.snippet: Shopping Mall yang terbesar di Kuching, Sarawak ialah Boulevard Shopping Mall, The Spring dan City One Megamall. Manakala The Summer Mall pula merupakan Shopping Mall terbesar di Kota Samarahan (30 minit dari Kuching).
sources.shortName: Senarai Shopping Mall Di Kuching (Sarawak) Yang Popular

places.name: CityONE Megamall

reviews.text:
like desolate places? empty parking lots? half dead shops & post apocalyptic crowds?
cityone is the PLACE TO BE! shop till you drop & dine to your heart's content at your own pace & privacy. all at a low flat rate of RM3 / entry!
don't wait, hurry up & come while this mall is still up before due demolition for poor sales & patronage!

CityONE Megamall in Kuching was once considered one of the biggest malls in the city. However, most of the shops are now closed, especially on the upper levels. The mall feels quiet and almost empty, with only a few stores and eateries still operating on the lower floor.
The mall is in the process of upgrading . A new food court at the first floor , quite contemporary designing taste. Everrise , diy and gsc are tenants as well.

places.address: One Megamall, T20, 3rd Floor,Mall 2 City, 1, Jalan Song, Taman Phoning, 93350 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

sources.snippet: Jika anda melawat ke pusat bandar Kuching, antara Shopping Mall yang berdekatan (in walking distance) ialah Plaza Merdeka Shopping Mall, Riverside Shopping Mall, Hills Shopping Mall, Sarawak Plaza Shopping Mall, Electra House, Wisma Satok dan Wisma Hopoh. Jika anda berminat untuk shopping barangan elektronik (Smartpone/tablet/komputer/laptop), anda boleh pergi ke Wisma Saberkas yang memang terkenal dengan pusat untuk membeli barangan elektronik.
sources.shortName: Senarai Shopping Mall Di Kuching (Sarawak) Yang Popular

sources.snippet: Wisma Saberkas Wisma Saberkas in Kuching  is a 22-storey shopping cum office complex with 7 storeys of shops and 15 storeys of offices. There  are over  40 computer shops and mobile phone shops and booths offering the latest and choices of ICT products such as laptops, desktop computes, printers, MP3 players, gaming software, digital cameras [‚Ä¶]
sources.shortName: Shopping Malls in Kuching Archives

places.name: Wisma Saberkas

reviews.text: The tallest shopping complex in Kuching has been here since before I was born. It has witnessed Kuching's history over the years.

old shopping complex way past its prime. interior not much change since 90s. no more anchor retail store & most shops closed / empty save for small businesses & food stalls. still the best place for IT, phones & electronics bargains.

This aging mall feels frozen in time, offering a raw slice of pre-gentrification Kuching commerce. The dim lighting, cracked floor tiles, and musty corridors scream 1990s nostalgia rather than modern retail comfort.

What keeps it alive:
- A stubborn cluster of phone repair shops that can resurrect any damaged device
- Bargain-bin priced accessories (cases, chargers, cables) you won't find in glitzier malls
- The occasional tech whiz who can source obscure electronic components

The food court on the upper level serves basic local fare - edible if you're desperate, but not worth a special trip. Prepare for questionable hygiene standards and aggressive aircon spots alternating with sweatbox zones.

Weekdays feel like wandering through an abandoned tech bazaar, while weekends bring slight energy from bargain hunters. Don't expect English signage or tourist-friendly amenities.

Rating: 2/5 - Only worth enduring for two reasons:
1) You need a phone fixed cheaply
2) You're a urban explorer documenting dying Malaysian retail spaces

places.address: Jalan Tun Abang Haji Openg, 93000 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

sources.shortName: Kuching‚Äôs festive ambience extends beyond malls, hotels; illuminating every corner with Christmas cheer
Senarai Shopping Mall Di Kuching (Sarawak) Yang Popular

places.name: ICOM Square

reviews.text: I come here to eat in the Izakaya Japanese Restaurant and it tasted so good. In the Icom Square you can find some restaurant, bank, cafe, convenient store and others shophouses. Good place!

Nice Indonesia cuisine here. Spacious. Can choose to sit outside. My friend ordered mee goreng for the kid and ended up it was spicy. So the kid couldn't take it. So if you are ordering food for kids, better ask or remind them about the spiciness.

Generally review as it's the location, not an outlet. Alot of eateries ranging from Indian mamak, Malay restaurant, Japanese sushi house etc.

Paid parking using Sarawak Pay, can be pretty hard finding a space during lunch break.

places.address: Icom Square, Jalan Pending, 93450 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: Located just 30 minutes away from Kuching City, The Summer Shopping Mall is a popular destination known for its wide variety of shops and vibrant atmosphere. It's a favorite among students from UNIMAS and IPG, offering plenty of clothing and shoe stores as well as a supermarket for grocery needs. While still undergoing development, the mall has plans to include a water theme park in the future.

sources.snippet: To know: You should certainly head over to Summer Mall which has a big reputation for being the best Kuching shopping mall!. Get yourself ready to have a remarkable time with your close ones creating a remarkable memory. To do: You‚Äôre going to come across many clothing stores and shoe stores in case you want to fetch something new to wear.
sources.shortName: The 10 Best Shopping Malls in Kuching

sources.snippet: Summer Mall is located some 30 minutes away from Kuching City. It is still undergoing development, in which when fully completed, would boast a water theme park. ‚Äì Photo by sarawakborneotour.comAddress: Jalan Datuk Mohammad Musa, Samarahan.
sources.shortName: Shopping Malls in Kuching

sources.snippet: Kalau dulu, kami pernah buat senarai Shopping Mall popular di KL dan kali ini pula ialah mengenai senarai Shopping Mall di Kuching, Sarawak dan juga tempat untuk membeli-belah yang popular di sekitar bandaraya Kuching.
sources.shortName: Senarai Shopping Mall Di Kuching (Sarawak) Yang Popular

places.name: The Summer Shopping Mall

reviews.text: Good place to spend time at weekend or public holiday.

Ongoing upgrading process, carpark still the dark...construction section still expose. Retail area improve with new & latest tenant that make the attraction...the management should make further promotion itself & not rely on the tenant
A fairly peaceful and not crowded shopping mall in Kota Samarahan. You can park underground or inside and claim for free parking when you purchase things for at least RM10 at Emart.

places.address: Lot 7455, Block 1, Jln Datuk Mohammad Musa, 94300 Kota Samarahan, Sarawak, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: Located in a smaller city center, The Hills is a contemporary mall known for its trendy food court, supermarket, and co-working space. While it was once a favorite shopping destination with everything from karaoke to Mr DIY and the food lounge, it has now transitioned into more of a community hub. The mall hosts events like book fairs and seasonal celebrations but has lost some of its former appeal to newer malls in town.

sources.snippet: The smaller city centre malls include Riverside Shopping Centre (next to Riverside Majestic Hotel), The Hills (Pullman Hotel) and Tun Jugah. Other good places for bargain hunting are Electra House, Wisma Hopoh and Wisma Satok (Jln Satok).
sources.shortName: Shopping Malls in Kuching | Visit Sarawak

sources.snippet: The hospitality scene also undergoes a seasonal transformation as hotels embrace the spirit of Christmas with towering trees that stand as beacons of holiday joy.
sources.shortName: Kuching‚Äôs festive ambience extends beyond malls, hotels; illuminating every corner with Christmas cheer

places.name: The Hills

reviews.text: walkable distance to the city center, beside Pullman hotel, for now this mall is not so crowded with shops, only got Mr Diy and supermarket thats all. but it was so good spot for coffee or food hunting, food court got alot variety of food, zus coffee, potato story and theres a lot of food here lah, i recommend yall to try their chicken rice, so delicious!!!! every food here are so good..

Mainly 2 shops opened, ie.Mr DIY and a supermarket. Yet, the food court here considered quite many patroning.
Food court fried rice is ok but mamak noodle too much curry power taste
Many food options at the food court. Easy to find parking. Best place to chill if staying at the nearby hotels.

places.address: Interhill Place, 8, Jalan Bukit Mata Kuching, 93100 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

places.name: Giant Mall | Kota Padawan

reviews.text:
It is a Giant, but only the grocery store that carries many items. From groceries to clothes, shoes, home furnishings, kitchen aids and toys. There is something there for everyone. I think it's more expensive than CS, D Valley or Farley.

I have issue with the open meat products, this cannot be hygenic. People can cough and sneeze on the product. Also, does the meat stay at 4C or below?

There is plenty of free parking and there is handicap parking available at the side of the mall door. Handicap access is good for those needing it. Convenient location in Padawan.

This place provides mini play ground for the kids. You can find Potato Story, Lea Centre, Eyesight Optic and SCR here. Pezzo and Sugarbun too. ATMs are also available. So far this place has the best Potato Story menu and the best Pezzo yet. They also sell clothes inside the Giant supermarket. Kids and babies clothes were sold with reasonable prices. Same goes to other things. A perfect spot for parents who want to bring their kids hanging out for a while. It basically has the essential for you to chill with your family.

Very spacious, easy to find what you need. Practically can get most daily needs there. Quality of the vegetables are deteriorating, most time the same veges are still there for many days and rotting away. Nevertheless still a convenient supermarket to visit for those staying nearby

places.address: Lorong Kota Padawan 2, 93250 Siburan, Sarawak, Malaysia

places.name: Electra House

reviews.text: 5 stars for memory lane....frequented it as a child, and now noticing it as an adult! A shadow of it's older days and I think it's future is in niche products. After all these years everything is still so solid ...they built well in the old days. Good luck to it.
The Legendary Shopping Mall at Kuching. It's sold varial equipment and also souvenir and gift. This building is so Legendary because of his history decade in Kuching town city

My last visit in 2009/2010, before i moved to KL. That year was still looked happening and very famous spot to chill out and then shopping for goods with loved one. One of the shop that selling clothes and other products are still open until now but the business is going slower. In front of the mall, there was an open air for food court and very cheap price.

places.address: Jalan Power, 93000 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

places.name: Moyan Square Mall

reviews.text: Oh I love this place ! They sell all sorts of stuff at a reasonable prices. They are actually on sale for their flower pots now , it's a buy one free one offer. Go grab yours !!!

A really underrated shopping mall. Discovered this hidden gem today and was amazed by the variety of items there. The mall is very clean, large and has a strategic layout. There are gardening supplies, furniture, household items, plumbing, power tools, toiletries and more. Their furniture selection has more variety and competitive prices compared to Emart. The air cond reduces in strength at the upper floors. A few cons are not enough food courts. There is a Mr DIY and a clothing store. Ample parking space. Good place for people looking to bulk buy, DIY their houses or set up a catering business.
The mall is not big but still got lots of stores. You can almost find anythings you need here since there are Mr.Diy, Ozora and New world Grocer here.
